name: 林志平
objective:
本課程旨在探討因應產業環境變化下，企業經營模式之變革。 經營模式變革中，如何創新經營模式？是本課程主題。課中除了基本經營模式方法論外，產業個案教材是其重點。個案教材之課程進行將採哈佛大學個案教學方式實施。
This course aims to investigate the transformation of the business model, under the changes in the industrial environment. During business model transformation, how to innovate the business model Is the theme of this course. In addition to the basic business model methodology, the lesson will cover industry case materials. Case teaching materials into the curriculum will be taken to implement by the Harvard University case teaching way.
schedule:
1. 產業分析
2. 產業關鍵因素研討
3. 個案分析
scorePolicy:
上課出席 40%
課堂討論 30%
研討報告 30%
